title: Generate telemetry declarations and fix import path in useActor.ts

requirements.summary: Generate TypeScript declarations for the telemetry canister by running 'dfx generate telemetry'
acceptanceCriteria: Telemetry canister declarations are generated successfully
TypeScript declaration files exist for the telemetry canister

file_operations.description: Add a comment documenting that telemetry declarations must be generated via 'dfx generate telemetry' before the import will resolve. This ensures developers understand the prerequisite step.

requirements.summary: Correct the import path in useActor.ts from '../../../declarations/telemetry' to the actual location of generated declarations
acceptanceCriteria: Import path in useActor.ts correctly points to the generated telemetry declarations
No import path errors during build
The import resolves to the actual location of generated declarations

file_operations.description: Update the import statement from '../../../declarations/telemetry' to the correct relative path. Based on typical dfx project structure, declarations are generated at the project root in a 'declarations' folder, so the correct path from frontend/src/hooks/ should be '../../../declarations/telemetry' (three levels up to project root). However, verify the actual folder structure after running 'dfx generate telemetry' and adjust to '../../declarations/telemetry' if declarations are inside the src directory, or '../declarations/telemetry' if they're in the frontend directory.

requirements.summary: Trigger a rebuild after declarations are generated and import paths are verified
acceptanceCriteria: Build completes successfully without declaration-related errors
Frontend builds with correct telemetry actor imports

file_operations.description: Ensure the telemetry actor import and initialization code in useActor.ts is ready for the rebuild. Verify that the telemetry actor is properly integrated into the dual-actor pattern without modifying the core authentication or access control initialization logic.
